礧字的基本解释

礧
léi
古同“礌”。
撞击：“骇崩浪而相礧。”

礧
lěi
不平。
堆砌。
大石貌。

礧
lèi
以木、石投物。

礧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lèi］
［《廣韻》盧對切，去隊，來。］
亦作“礌1”。亦作“礨1”。
(1)转石；以木、石下投。
(2)自高处投击敌人的木、石。
[②]［lěi］
［《廣韻》落猥切，上賄，來。］
亦作“礌2”。
(1)大石貌。参见“礧2硌”。
(2)不平貌。参见“礧2磈”。
(3)堆积；堆砌。
(4)见“礧2落”。
[③]［léi］
［《集韻》盧回切，平灰，來。］
亦作“礌3”。
(1)撞击；冲击。
(2)碾；磨。
(3)舂；捣。
(4)木石制磨谷用具。

礧字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　礧； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页838第20
【廣韻】落猥切【集韻】魯猥切，?音磊。礧硌，大石。　又【集韻】魯水切，音壘。碨礧，山貌。或作??。亦作??。　又盧回切，音雷。擊也。石轉突也。【郭璞·江賦】駭崩浪而相礧。　又盧對切，音類。【廣韻】礧䃍，重也。　又同礌。【埤蒼】推石自高而下也。【司馬相如·子虛賦】礧石相擊。　又【字彙補】同傀儡之儡。【唐書·音訓】窟儡子，亦曰魁礧子。作偶人以戲。

礧字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
礧字的起名意思

暂无。

heap of stones
Basic explanation of words
heap of stones
léi
The ancient same as "Xin".
Impact: "The waves crashed and shook each other."
heap of stones
lěi
Uneven.
Pile up.
Great stone appearance.
heap of stones
lèi
Throw objects with wood and stones.
heap of stones
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lèi］
["Guangyun" Lu cut, go to the team, come. ]
Also known as "礌1". Also known as "礨1".
(1) Turn the stone; cast down with wood or stone.
(2) Throw the enemy's wood and stone from a height.
[②] [lěi]
["Guangyun" is cut off, bribes, come. ]
Also known as "礌2".
(1) The appearance of the big stone. See "Zi 2 硌".
(2) Uneven appearance. See "Square 2".
(3) Pile up; pile up.
(4) See "Liao 2 Fall".
[③]［léi］
["Ji Yun" Lu Hui cut, flat gray, come. ]
Also known as "Xi 3".
(1) Impact; impact.
(2) Milling; grinding.
(3) To pound; pound.
(4) Grinding tools made of wood and stone.
heap of stones
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　礧; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 838 No. 20
[Guang Yun] Luo Youqie [Jiyun] Lu Youqie,? Yin Lei.礧硌, dashi.　 [Ji Yun] Lu Shui cut, sound barrier. Sui, mountain appearance. Or as ??. Also for??.　Lu cut back again, Yinlei. Hit also. Shi Zhuan suddenly also. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] The smashed waves are in harmony with each other.　 Lu cut again, phonology. [Guang Yun] 大䃍，重也。　The same thing again. [Picang] Push the stone from above. 【Sima Xiangru·Zixu Fu】Strike against each other with stones.　[Word Supplement] Same as the puppet. [Tang Shu·Yinxun] Kuizi is also called Kueizi. Play as a puppet.
heap of stones

heap of stones
Name meaning
Nothing.
lèi, léi, lěi
I гл.
1) lèi, léi скатывать вниз камни; скатываться
2) lěi громоздиться (о камнях, скалах)
II сущ. lěi
крупные камни; скалы; каменистый
